mapper.select: SELECT pc_id pcId , pc_image pcImage , pc_sketch pcSketch , pc_address pcAddress,pc_person pcPerson , pc_time pcTime, pc_author pcAuthor FROM pc_information
select p_id pId,p_name pName,p_birthday pBirthday,p_tag pTag,i_id iId,p_gender pGender FROM personal_data
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pc_information(pc_image , pc_sketch , pc_address , pc_person , pc_time , pc_author,pc_name) VALUES (#{pcImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pcSketch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pcPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pcTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pcAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
